appName: Beat Shooter - Gun Battle Saber Club VR

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Beat Shooter - Gun Battle Saber Club VR
display_name: Beat Shooter - Gun Battle Saber Club VR
display_long_description:
CeberilloStudion Rhythm-based mechanics keeps players on their toes. The game emphasizes reflexes, positioning, and adaptability as players face waves of enemies of increasing difficulty, each with unique combat patterns, strengths, and weaknesses.

Locations:
Industrial Zone: 
In the heart of the city’s production district, the Industrial Zone is filled with automated drones, assembly lines, and towering machinery. This high-stakes battleground is fast-paced, with cover constantly shifting and traps hidden in the shadows.

Night Markets: 
These bustling hubs are packed with neon signs, food stalls, and holographic advertisements. Enemies blend into the crowd, using the chaos of the market to their advantage. Players must navigate narrow alleyways and multi-level structures to take down foes.

Corporate Skyscrapers: 
Ascend through glossy, high-security skyscrapers filled with corporate guards and high-tech security systems. These levels require stealth and strategy, with advanced enemy AI making use of holograms, cloaking devices, and aerial drones. CeberilloStudidron

Outskirts and Slums: 
The outskirts of the city are dark and desolate, filled with abandoned buildings and hidden tunnels. Here, players face some of the city’s most desperate and dangerous criminals. The soundtrack here takes on a darker tone, amplifying the sense of isolation and danger.
